ygData.subject: Re: Re: New Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: I sold someof my jewelery and equipment at the store and bought bronze greaves for 26 plat that was at lev 15 I think they would probobly drag first stage
ygData.messageBody:
I sold someof my jewelery and equipment at the store and bought bronze
greaves for 26 plat
that was at lev 15 I think
they would probobly drag first stage plate armors up to level 20+....
no thanks

----- Original Message -----
From: Avron Elselynn <avron@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 6:47 PM
Subject: SV: [EverQuest] Re: New Survey


> From: "Avron Elselynn" <avron@...>
>
> Well, there is no reason to cap player created items is there.. :)
>
> - Avron -
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Shane Bole <shane0009@...>
> To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 6:50 AM
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: New Survey
>
>
> > From: "Shane Bole" <shane0009@...>
> >
> > a level cap would be nice, but my cleric was able to purchase banded at
> > level 8 without help and I dont think they would cap banded that low
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Avron <avron@...>
> > To: EverQuest <EverQuest@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Monday, August 02, 1999 10:46 PM
> > Subject: [EverQuest] Re: New Survey
> >
> >
> > > From: Avron <avron@...>
> > >
> > >
> > > Well the problem now is that they are stopping twinking by making
items NO
> > > DROP, which ruins the playerbased economy since you can't trade the
> > > items at all, I think level caps would be a MUCH better way to deal
with
> > > it.. Level caps and LORE that is..
> > >
> > > - Avron Elselynn -
> > >
> > >
> > > From: Jonathan <jp1234@...>
> > >
> > > >Twinking is okay to a certain extent, but a level 1 should not have
full
> > > >steel and a ghoulbane. What's the point of even playing the
character?
> > > >Isnt half the fun getting some of the items yourself? I can
understand
> > > >and have no problem with some twinking.. maybe some bronze and a
pretty
> > > >good weapon and shield, but that's just dumb.
> > >
> > >
> > >
